Tunable.name: INTERACTION_SPINUP_TIMETIMEOUT_TIME
Tunable.description: The maximum number of ticks that the server takes trying to restore SI's to restore staged interactions or run preroll autonomy.

Tunable.name: INTERACTION_SPINUP_TRANSITIONING_TIME
Tunable.description: The number of ticks that we take waiting for sims to get in transitioning interactions.
